code: import axios from"axios";import{GET_POST,GET_POSTS,ADD_POST,DELETE_POST,POST_LOADING,GET_ERRORS,CLEAR_ERRORS}from"./types";export var addPost=function addPost(postData){return function(dispatch){dispatch(clearErrors());axios.post('api/post',postData).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_POST,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(postId,commentId){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/post/comment/".concat(postId,"/").concat(commentId)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_POST,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var addcomment=function addcomment(id,_addcomment){return function(dispatch){dispatch(clearErrors());axios.post("/api/post/comment/".concat(id),_addcomment).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_POST,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var getPosts=function getPosts(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setLoading());axios.get('api/post').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_POSTS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_POSTS,payload:null});});};};export var removeLike=function removeLike(id){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/post/unlike/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch(getPosts());}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var likePost=function likePost(id){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/post/like/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch(getPosts());}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var getPost=function getPost(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setLoading);axios.get("/api/post/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_POST,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_POST,payload:null});});};};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("api/post/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_POST,payload:id});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(){return{type:POST_LOADING};};export var clearErrors=function clearErrors(){return{type:CLEAR_ERRORS};};
